SQL.LOAD: SELECT acct_event_detail_id, dealer_id, coverage_type_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, acct_event_detail_incexc_id FROM elp_acct_event_detail_incexc WHERE acct_event_detail_incexc_id = :acct_event_detail_incexc_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT acct_event_detail_id, dealer_id, coverage_type_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, acct_event_detail_incexc_id FROM elp_acct_event_detail_incexc WHERE acct_event_detail_id = :acct_event_detail_id
SQL.LOAD_DEALER_LIST_BY_LINE_ITEM: select distinct d.dealer_id as ID, c.code || ' - ' || d.dealer || ' (' || d.DEALER_NAME || ')' AS DESCRIPTION from ELP_ACCT_EVENT ae inner join elp_company c on c.ACCT_COMPANY_ID = ae.ACCT_COMPANY_ID inner join elp_Dealer d on d.company_id = c.company_id where 1=1 and ae.ACCT_EVENT_ID = :acct_event_id and c.company_id in (Select company_id from ELP_USER_COMPANY where user_id = :user_id) order by DESCRIPTION
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_acct_event_detail_incexc SET acct_event_detail_id = :acct_event_detail_id, dealer_id = :dealer_id, coverage_type_id = :coverage_type_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE acct_event_detail_incexc_id = :acct_event_detail_incexc_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_acct_event_detail_incexc ( acct_event_detail_id, dealer_id, coverage_type_id, created_by, acct_event_detail_incexc_id ) VALUES ( :acct_event_detail_id, :dealer_id, :coverage_type_id, :created_by, :acct_event_detail_incexc_id )
